remarks: Proof of ~ dvelimf using ~ dveeq2 (shown as the last hypothesis) instead of ~ ax-12 .  This shows that ~ ax-12 could be replaced by ~ dveeq2 (the last hypothesis).  (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 21-Jul-2011.)
statement:
dvelimfALT2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
dvelimfALT2.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. z ps ) $.
dvelimfALT2.3 $e |- ( z = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
dvelimfALT2.4 $e |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( z = y -> A. x z = y ) ) $.
dvelimfALT2 $p |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( ps -> A. x ps ) ) $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
